content.subTitle: New beginnings
content.text: I'm born in Sweden & moved to the US in 2017 to build a life with my wonderful partner.

content.subTitle: Craving change
content.text: I started my programming journey in March 2024, after 6 years as a visual merchandiser. Since then, I've dedicated 40+ hours a week to front & back-end development.

content.subTitle: Best of two worlds
content.text: To me, the most stimulating aspect of programming is how it encurages both creativity & logical thinking.

content.subTitle: User first
content.text: Creating a seamless & inclusive user experience is my top priority. I implement every application feature with user-first approach.

content.subTitle: Scalable & clean
content.text: I want to make life easy for fellow developers by writing clean, reusable & scalable code. The goal is to ensure that every application I build is dynamic, logical & maintainable.

content.subTitle: Never stop learning
content.text: Every project is a new opportunity to learn. I like going outside of my comfort zone - it keeps me motivated & helps me grow.

content.subTitle: Curious by nature
content.text: I love trying new things - whether it's tasting a dish for the first time, testing out a new JavaScript trick or randomly going on a daytrip to a place I've never been.

content.subTitle: Inspirations
content.text: I am & have always been a creative person, finding inspiration in nature, art, design & the occasional thought-provoking discussion. When I'm not coding I'll be sketching, reading books, taking pictures or skiing.
